task.title: Link User Accounts
task.shortdesc: Link your Studio account to your Livefyre account to moderate or manage all of your Livefyre sites or networks from a single location.

context.note: To interact with a Livefyre App (for example, leave a comment, add a Sidenote, or share content), you must log in using your Livefyre account username and password, and not your Studio account username and password.

step.cmd: Log into Studio after creating a Livefyre user profile on your network.
Go to Users, find your User Profile, and double click to view details.
In the window that opens, select the user account to link to this account.
Confirm the Link Profile information, and click Link.
